page.title: 07Meadowbank Sports Centre
page.content:
{Meadowbank Sports Centre}was built for the Commonwealth Games in 1970. It is used for {recreation,athletics }and sporting events. Entrants for the Olympics train there. I go to Meadowbank for badminton and karate, as I want to be fit and protect myself against muggers. We asked an attendant why he chose to work there. He said he was made redundant from Portobello Power Station and had applied for any situation there. He sets up halls for the various sports. We asked a member of the public why he used Meadowbank. He used the track once a month for running, and he thought that the Stadium had something for everyone.
Edinburgh has also many other centres for all types of sport and leisure activities.
